QuestData.Title: A Gift For Haohan
QuestData.Description: Haohan Mudclaw is the big boss of the Tillers union and the richest guy in the Valley! He's been nice to let me stay here, so I want to do something nice for him.$b$bHe likes expensive stuff, like ruby shards, but I don't have a lot of money, so I need to get him something else.$b$bI know! I've seen a great big fish in Cattail Lake! We should get one of its teeth as a gift!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I need to be nice to him if I want to be a farmer someday!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain an Enormous Cattail Grouper Tooth.
